statements: UPDATE TrafficAnalysis SET vehicle_count = 100 WHERE intersection_id = 1;
UPDATE TrafficAnalysis SET average_speed = 35.5, vehicle_count = 75 WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-08-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-08-31 23:59:59';
UPDATE TrafficAnalysis SET vehicle_count = 100, average_speed = 60.5 WHERE intersection_id = 1 AND timestamp = '2022-01-15 08:30:00';
UPDATE TrafficAnalysis SET average_speed = 70.2, vehicle_count = 80 WHERE timestamp = '2022-01-16 10:45:00' AND intersection_id = 2;
UPDATE traffic_patterns SET traffic_volume = 500, vehicle_type = 'Car' WHERE intersection_id = 1;
UPDATE signal_timings SET yellow_light_duration = 10, red_light_duration = 30, green_light_duration = 40 WHERE intersection_id = 2;
UPDATE traffic_patterns SET average_speed = 40.5, vehicle_type = 'Car' WHERE intersection_id = 1
UPDATE signal_timings SET yellow_light_duration = 15, green_light_duration = 30 WHERE intersection_id = 2
UPDATE Intersection SET traffic_flow = 30 WHERE intersection_id = 1;
UPDATE Vehicle SET vehicle_speed = 60, direction = 'North' WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
UPDATE Intersection SET traffic_flow = 5 WHERE intersection_id = 1;
UPDATE Signal SET signal_color = 'RED', signal_duration = 30 WHERE signal_id = 3;
UPDATE traffic_streets SET traffic_flow = 150.75 WHERE street_id = 1;
UPDATE intersection_signals SET signal_light_color = 'Green', signal_duration = 30 WHERE signal_id = 3;
UPDATE traffic_streets SET traffic_flow = 500.25 WHERE street_id = 1
UPDATE traffic_data SET timestamp = '2022-02-15 10:30:00', traffic_volume = 750.30 WHERE data_id = 5
UPDATE intersection_signals SET signal_color='GREEN', signal_duration=30 WHERE intersection_id=1;
UPDATE traffic_cameras SET location='Main Street', is_active=true WHERE camera_id=2;
UPDATE intersection_signals SET signal_duration = 60 WHERE intersection_id = 1;
UPDATE traffic_cameras SET is_active = false WHERE camera_id = 3;
